venue.name: Blackstone River Valley Bikeway @ The Blackstone River State Park

item.description: Hello People The weather looks pretty good for this Sat. so this ride is ON!!   WE WILL MEET AT 91 FRONT ST.!!Other members say there is a sign there for Blackstone Park, I'll  be standing there to guide you Remember, 91 Front St. disregard my last message about Lower River Rd. Rich  WE WILL MEET AT 91 FRONT ST.!!
item.how_to_find_us: 91 Front St. I'll be there looking for you to direct you
item.name: Bike Ride Blackstone River Bike Path, Blackstone State Park
